channel.title: Mezzyscape v4
channel.description:
K i finally made up my fkin mind i almost got barrows done so ye :D
To Add Barrows 100% 100% D Claws Spec on NPC / player 500+ npc spawns 500+ dialogues 15 quests All skills Webclient Load objects from objectspawn.cfg (if it doesnt already) Bones burrying, 100% like RuneScape Item On Players Full C&P Advanced 508 Control Panel with many features Pvp Drops[Pali] Adding NPCOption3 and 4 Adding Client Registration Loading IP Ban/Ban list in XML (if it doesnt already) adding 100% prayer (g altar) 100% contruction 100% Food (like rs) thieving stalls (if it doesnt have) Herblore (cleaning + potions) (if it doesnt have) Real RuneScape following (DANCE) Face coords Armor sets Hybrid Switches/Same Slot Saving Proper NPC Following Fully working World button Fixing Missing Map Data / Reading Packed Data Files Adding Agility using EventManager Censor List Object Examine Objects Examine D claws using event Fixing: walking to object then activating it Creating Highscores Via Website ( not really sure about it might not) Spawning Items To Bank 100% clue scroll system, easily converted to all revisions/bases Checking if the player has moved (skills ect.) Creating a customizable kill command NPC Aggression High Alchemy & Tab Switching Full Level Up + Full Skill Icons (100%-Finished) ClanChat with Ranks Friends/ignores/PMs wild outside of wild (without lev difference)[508] 99% Shopping Full Chatlog Adding player right click options, and making them do things Cooking(Palis)USING EVENTS How to make NPC's re-spawn and walk, and be agressive working dummys PKPoint Strength d claws with full spec Teletabs using EventManager 100% No-clip fix Random Events for Mining NPC Dropping system 500% 100% Working poisoning. Quick Chat Blah Blah 508 Quickchat base Points/Token shop item/npc/object ids in right click Basic NPC Combat for Pali's NIO Base Making Players Save On Restart EventManager - 100% Anti-Fire potion Full Toy Kite
